data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: When we stop taking risks, we stop living life.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Today’s a great day to behave as the person you’ve always wanted to be.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Make your faith larger than your fears and your dreams bigger than your doubts.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Be slow to criticize and fast to appreciate.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t be great if you don’t feel great. Make exceptional health your number one priority.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t win if you don’t try.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: If you want to have the results only 5% have, you must be willing to do and think like only 5% do and think.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Simplicity is the trademark of genius.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: It’s not about the end goal, it’s about who you become by consistently pushing to the edge of your limits.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The way you start your day determines how well you live your day.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Dream big, start small, act now.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Life is short. Do big things.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Victims make excuses. Leaders deliver results.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: The quality of your life is determined by the quality of your thoughts.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: You can’t win the game if you don’t even play it.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: All change is hard at the first, messy in the middle, and so gorgeous at the end.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Ordinary people love entertainment. Extraordinary people adore education.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Close all your escape routes, burn all your plan b’s and get busy doing that dream that only you were built to do.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Hard times produce your greatest gifts.

data.author: Robin Sharma
data.quote: Fear is a big liar.
